result.eng: Estate owners were not able to attract workers from Europe to America.
result.ga: ní raibh úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibrithe a mhealladh as an eoraip ná as meiriceá
result.orig: Ní raibh úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibrithe a mhealladh as an Eoraip ná as Meiriceá

result.eng: He was so short of sense as a child five years younger than him.
result.ga: bhí sé chomh gann i gcéill leis an leanbh a bhí cúig bliana ní b'óige ná é

result.ponchtml: ḃí sé ċoṁ gann i gcéill leis an leanḃ a ḃí cúig bliana ní b'óige ná éHe was so short of sense as a child five years younger than him.

result.eng: Don't be out for too long.

result.eng: You could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.

result.eng: I hate him more than the devil.
result.ga: ní lú orm an diabhal ná é

result.eng: For the life of you, don't let it get away from you!
